metadata.title: CVE-2022-25310 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
fribidi: SEGV in fribidi_remove_bidi_marks

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-25310` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfribidi-bin - 1.0.8-2ubuntu2.1
libfribidi0 - 1.0.8-2ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

notes.note: rayveldkamp> For bionic affected function is in fribidi-deprecated.c

criterions.comment: fribidi package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.8-2ubuntu2.1').
